column1: Does the Supplier's solution have protections in place to prevent unauthorized physical access to data/information stored in the public cloud?
Does the Supplier have the capability to securely purge all client data upon termination of the relationship?
How often is your security program assessed by an independent third-party assessor?
How often do you have an independent third-party perform external vulnerability scans and penetration testing?
Are you willing to share the independent third-party reports?
How do you limit and monitor physical access to information systems, equipment, and the respective operating environments to authorized individuals and activities?
Can we tour your data center?
